Package com.james.erebus.networking

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddDeviceTask
    A TimerTask for adding a device to the server
    AddMatchSubscriptionTask
    A TimerTask for adding a Match subscription to the server
    AddTournamentSubscriptionToServerTask
    A TimerTask for adding a Tournament subscription to the server
    GetMatchesTask
    A TimerTask for getting match information from the server
    GetTournamentsTask
    A TimerTask for getting tournament information from the server
    MatchRetriever
    Child class of Retriever that specifies the URI and filename for match-specific retrieval
    MatchSubscriptionManager
    Child class of SubscriptionManager that specifies the filename that subscribed matches get saved to and adds methods to add, remove and get subscribed matches
    MiscNetworkingHelpers
    A helper class which provides the necessary methods to POST and DELETE information to and from the server and to add information to internal files
    NotificationManager
    This class manages the Notification class and provides methods to add, remove and
    RemoveMatchSubscriptionFromServerTask
    A TimerTask for removing a match subscription from the server
    RemoveTournamentSubscriptionFromServerTask
    A TimerTask for removing a tournament subscription from the server
    Retriever
    Parent class that implements network retrieval of information from the main back-end server
    SubscriptionManager
    A class to manage writing and reading subscriptions
    SubscriptionRetriever
    Child class of the Retriever class for retrieving subscriptions
    TournamentRetriever
    Child class of Retriever for retrieving tournaments
    TournamentSubscriptionManager
    Child class of SubscriptionManager for managing Tournament subscriptions
